item.title: Quince: UX Pattern Explorer
item.description: Just in case you don’t already know it: Quince - calls itself an UX Patterns Explorer and that’s just what it is. You want to improve the user experience of your applications? Just take a look at this marble. It contains a large number of design patterns for creating great user interfaces. Even the exploration part of this tool is innovative: The patterns are not only ordered alphabetically by name but can be found by the tasks the user wants to accomplish.
